text: Jacques Moïse Eugène Noyer (17 April 1927 – 2 June 2020) was a French Roman Catholic prelate. He was Bishop of Amiens from 31 October 1987 to 10 March 2003. He was born in Le Touquet, France. He was a Knight of the Legion of Honour in 1993. Noyer died on 2 June 2020 in Le Touquet at the age of 93. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Amiens
title: Jacques Noyer
